Author: izaghar
Name: Allagan Sync
Punchline: Sync your FFXIV collections with allagan.app
Description: Allagan Sync - Sync your mounts, minions, orchestrion rolls, emotes, titles, achievements, bardings, Triple Triad cards, fashion accessories, facewear, sightseeing log, fish, Blue Mage spells, and character customizations with allagan.app.
